name: gitissue-manager
description: Automate GitHub issue creation from Markdown checklists with optional Project V2 sync

scripts.prepare:all: for cfg in sync-helper/configs/*.json; do node client/prepare.js --config "$cfg"; done
scripts.execute:all: for cfg in sync-helper/configs/*.json; do node server/executor.js --config "$cfg"; done
scripts.full:all: for cfg in sync-helper/configs/*.json; do node client/prepare.js --config "$cfg" && node server/executor.js --config "$cfg"; done
scripts.output:summary: jq '{executed: .executedAt, repo: .results[0].repo, total: (.results[0].tasks | length), created: [.results[0].tasks[] | select(.created == true)] | length, errors: [.results[0].tasks[] | select(.error)] | length}' tmp/*/engine-output.json 2>/dev/null || echo 'No output files found'
scripts.output:errors: jq '[.results[0].tasks[] | select(.error)] | .[0:5]' tmp/*/engine-output.json 2>/dev/null || echo 'No output files found'
scripts.output:last: jq '.results[0].tasks[-10:]' tmp/*/engine-output.json 2>/dev/null || echo 'No output files found'
scripts.verify:issues: bash -c 'CONFIG=${npm_config_config:-sync-helper/configs/*.json}; REPO=$(jq -r .repo $CONFIG | head -1); gh issue list --repo $REPO --label sync-md --limit 10'
scripts.verify:count: bash -c 'CONFIG=${npm_config_config:-sync-helper/configs/*.json}; REPO=$(jq -r .repo $CONFIG | head -1); gh issue list --repo $REPO --label sync-md --limit 1000 --json number | jq length'
